level.text: ABRA shall provide a licensee with either an investigative report or a public police incident report that may result in a show cause hearing as set forth in § 25-447 within 90 days of the date upon which the incident occurred.
The requirement in subsection (a) of this section shall not apply where:
Criminal action is being considered against the licensee or its employees; or
Enforcement action is requested by the Chief of Police under § 25-827.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171, in subsec. (b), inserted a colon following "where".

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 25-340.
